comment:
* Common configuration for a single property (field) in a Document. * *

For example, an {@code EmailMessage} would be a type and the {@code subject} would be a * property.

variables.name: DATA_TYPE_DOCUMENT
variables.comment:
* Indicates that the property is itself a {@link GenericDocument}, making it part of a
         * hierarchical schema. Any property using this DataType MUST have a valid {@link
         * PropertyConfig#getSchemaType}.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: void appendPropertyConfigString(@NonNull IndentingStringBuilder builder)
methods.comment:
* Appends a debug string for the {@link AppSearchSchema.PropertyConfig} instance to the
         * given string builder.
         *
         * @param builder the builder to append to.

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: Returns the name of this property.

methods.name: public String getDescription()
methods.comment:
* Returns a natural language description of this property. * *

Ex. The description for the "homeAddress" property of a "Person" type could be "the * address at which this person lives". * *

This information is purely to help apps consuming this type the semantic meaning of * its properties. This field has no effect in AppSearch - it is just stored with the * AppSearchSchema. If the description is not set, then this method will return an empty * string.

methods.name: public int getDataType()
methods.comment:
* Returns the type of data the property contains (such as string, int, bytes, etc).
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public int getCardinality()
methods.comment: * Returns the cardinality of the property (whether it is optional, required or repeated).

methods.name: public static PropertyConfig fromParcel(@NonNull PropertyConfigParcel propertyConfigParcel)
methods.comment:
* Converts a {@link Bundle} into a {@link PropertyConfig} depending on its internal data * type. * *

The bundle is not cloned. * * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the bundle does no contain a recognized value in its * {@code DATA_TYPE_FIELD}. * @hide

methodNames: public static PropertyConfig fromParcel(@NonNull PropertyConfigParcel propertyConfigParcel)
